Subskills.name: Pressurized Bombs
Subskills.description: Increases area of effect radius of bouncing grenade.

Subskills.name: Strong Lats
Subskills.description: Increased the projecile speed of bouncing grenade.

Subskills.name: Resetting Fuse
Subskills.description: Bouncing from terrain resets the duration of bouncing grenade.

Subskills.name: Nitroglycerine Solution
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by bouncing grenade.

Subskills.name: Elastic Cover
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of bounces for bouncing grenade.

Subskills.name: Ace Up Your Sleeve
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional bouncing grenade.

Subskills.name: Big Boy Bombs
Subskills.description: Increases the size of bouncing grenade.

Subskills.name: Coast to Coast
Subskills.description: Throw multiple bouncing grenades in an arc.

Subskills.name: Rubber Coated Shell
Subskills.description: Chance for bouncing grenades to bounce off of terrain.

Subskills.name: Sharp Shrapnels
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict fire break on hit.

Subskills.name: Flammable Charge
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Blazing Rebound
Subskills.description: Hitting a monster causes bouncing grenade to bounce towards another nearby monster increasing its damage.

Subskills.name: Fiery Charge
Subskills.description: Each bounce increases the size of the molten trail. Unleash flames on a large radius inflicting burning after exploding.
